txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Tough carapaces from the spiders and insects in the central Lone-lands. Bring the carapaces to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth.
'It may seem strange, but these can be used effectively against our enemies.\n\n'Thank you.'
'If you can claim carapaces that are still mostly whole, we can convert them into armour for our people.'
Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth desires tough carapaces from the insects and spiders found throughout the central and eastern Lone-lands.
Deliver the tough carapaces to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth
You accepted a task from Frideric the Elder to acquire tough carapaces from the spiders and insects in the central and eastern Lone-lands. You can find Frideric the Elder within Ost Guruth.
Wanted: Tough carapaces from the spiders and insects in the central Lone-lands.
